price: Ɛne sε, modii ahurusie wͻ asaase no so a εnyε ne kwan soͻ, na afei momaa moho so.
arabic: ذَٰلِكُم بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَفۡرَحُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ بِغَيۡرِ ٱلۡحَقِّ وَبِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَمۡرَحُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: dhālikum bimā kuntum tafraḥūna fī al-arḍi bighayri al-ḥaqi wabimā kuntum tamraḥūna
